aka: I Like it When You Speak Up
trans_title: I Like it When You Speak Up
introduction: I like it when you speak up, goes through a day in the life of different feminist women and diversities: an erotic poet, an influencer, an environmental activist, a land worker, a company CEO, a housewife. What is the image that represents your feminism? Is the question that transmutes the sensations of each one, to an audiovisual device.
